Plot: Obsessed with Pride and Prejudice (1995), a woman travels to a Jane Austen theme park in search for her perfect gentleman.
Title: Austenland
Writer: Jerusha Hess (screenplay), Shannon Hale (screenplay), Shannon Hale (based on the novel by)
Actors: Keri Russell, JJ Feild, Bret McKenzie, Jennifer Coolidge
tomatoConsensus: Despite an intriguing premise and fine performances from a talented cast, Austenland succumbs to outworn romcom cliches and slapstick gags.
